product_overview: FitAI is a mobile fitness and nutrition application leveraging AI-powered personalized workout and nutrition plans, comprehensive tracking, and advanced UI components with a dark cosmic theme for an immersive user experience.
core_goals: Provide personalized AI-driven workout plans based on user profile and goals.
Enable AI-powered nutrition analysis and meal planning with detailed macro tracking.
Offer robust tracking of fitness progress, nutrition, and achievements with interactive visualizations.
Support offline usage with automatic syncing to ensure continuous access and data integrity.
Deliver an engaging, accessible, and responsive UI experience with advanced animations and components.
key_features: Complete user authentication system with signup, login, logout, and session management using Supabase Auth.
Personalized onboarding flow collecting user info, fitness goals, and preferences.
AI-driven workout plan generation using Google Gemini AI integration.
Smart AI nutrition analysis with calorie calculation and macro tracking.
Comprehensive exercise and food databases with detailed descriptions and nutrition info.
Dynamic achievement system with over 25 achievements to motivate user consistency and milestones.
Custom tab-based main navigation including Home, Fitness, Diet, Progress, and Profile screens.
Advanced UI components including interactive charts (ProgressChart, NutritionChart, WorkoutIntensityChart), camera integration for food scanning and progress photos, and rich animations.
Robust state management with Zustand and offline-first architecture for seamless user experience.
Dark cosmic CultFit-inspired theme with consistent styling and accessibility support.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in via the authentication system, with session maintained securely.
New users complete the onboarding flow to input personal info, fitness goals, and preferences.
Users access the Home dashboard to view stats, daily progress, and quick AI recommendations.
Users navigate to Fitness screen to view and start AI-generated workouts with detailed exercise instructions and progress tracking.
Diet screen enables meal logging, AI meal plan suggestions, and nutrition analysis with macro breakdowns.
Progress screen shows body metrics, charts, and accomplishments to monitor goals and consistency.
Profile screen allows users to manage account info, settings, and app configurations.
Users can capture food or progress photos via integrated camera components, with real-time scanning and AI analysis.
Advanced UI interactions include swipe gestures, pull to refresh, and long press context menus enhancing usability.
validation_criteria: Authentication flows function correctly with secure signup, login, logout, and session persistence.
AI-generated workouts align with user profiles and fitness goals accurately.
Nutrition analysis calculates calories and macros precisely with AI insights.
All tracking charts display correct, smooth visualizations with selectable time ranges.
Offline data caching and sync ensure no data loss or inconsistencies when reconnecting.
Achievement triggers occur correctly upon milestones and consistency checks.
Camera features operate with proper permission handling, mode-specific capture, and image quality.
All advanced UI components render correctly and remain responsive on supported devices and screen sizes.
App theme consistently applies dark cosmic styling with proper accessibility and high contrast compliance.
Performance optimizations ensure smooth animations, quick screen loads, and responsive interactions.
